lyrics:
Called to walk in the way of the Man who stilled the waters,
Called to walk in the way of the Man who calmed the sea,
Called to live in the world and be free to live for others,
Called to walk in the way of the Man from Galilee.

Hear the Word that’s the Word
that’s been said for all God’s creatures,
Hear the Word that’s the Word that’s been said for you and me;
It’s the Word about life we are called to give each other,
It’s the Word that will give us our possibility
